item.title: ðŸ‘¾ LOL E-sports Data Scraper ðŸ‘¾
item.description: This project scrapes the hidden E-sports API that Riot uses internally for their player statistics in their League of Legends Championship series. This is written in Python and runs with a Shell script for housekeeping. It takes all of the interesting data and outputs it into neat and tidy JSON files that contain the data by event, and by player! Code available here!
